person.persName: John Hobson Grider (Warren County, Kentucky, constable and soldier)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, constable and soldier. Kentucky native. Constable of Warren County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Warren County in 1860. Served in in the 9th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as adjutant, major, and lieutenant colonel from November 1861 to May 1863. Served in the 52nd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as lieutenant colonel and colonel from November 1863 to January 1865.
